mediapackage.title: Strong river flowing down the forest

encoder.type: H.264 / AVC / MPEG-4 AVC / MPEG-4 part 10

result.dcTitle: Strong river flowing down the forest
result.dcDescription: Free stock footage of a strong river flowing down the dense green summer forest on a sunny day, late in the evening. Different trees on each side of the river, while white bubbles coming from the water as it rushes down the rocky landscape. This footage was taken with a Mavic 2 Pro drone mounted on a tripod with a Katana grip
